testcase.name: test_create_temporal_authorization
testcase.failure: test_p0_hardening.py:165: in test_create_temporal_authorization assert response.status_code in [200, 201], f"Expected 200/201, got {response.status_code}: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Expected 200/201, got 422: {"detail":[{"type":"enum","loc":["body","authorization_type"],"msg":"Input should be 'temporary', 'permanent', 'recurring' or 'extended'","input":"temporal","ctx":{"expected":"'temporary', 'permanent', 'recurring' or 'extended'"},"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/enum"}]} E assert 422 in [200, 201] E + where 422 = <Response [422]>.status_code
